Question: Around 2 billion cups of coffee are drunk each day worldwide
How many coffee capsules are produced each year?
80% of all capsules worldwide end up in landfill or the ocean
Most capsules are made of aluminium or plastic which will not biodegrade
Is there a biodegradable capsule on the market I can compost with my food waste?
I want a capsule I can trust - quality coffee without the greenwash
